bonafide_certificate.description: A certificate to prove that the student is currently enrolled in Delhi Technological University.
bonafide_certificate.notes: For scholarship or internship purposes, specify the reason in the form.

transcript_request.description: Request for official academic transcripts for higher education or verification purposes.
required_documents: Copy of all semester grade cards
transcript_request.notes: Transcripts can also be sent directly to universities if mailing details are provided.

duplicate_id_card.description: Application for reissuing a lost or damaged student ID card.
duplicate_id_card.notes: Ensure the FIR mentions 'Loss of DTU ID card'.

fee_slip_request.description: Request to obtain a copy of the semester fee slip.
fee_slip_request.notes: Fee slips can also be downloaded from the ERP portal.

hostel_admission.description: Application for availing hostel accommodation for a semester.
hostel_admission.notes: Allotment is subject to availability and merit list.

hostel_leave.description: Application for leave from hostel for a defined duration.
hostel_leave.notes: Leave exceeding 7 days requires Dean of Student Welfare approval.

degree_certificate.description: Application for original degree certificate after completion of course.
degree_certificate.notes: Degree is issued only after clearance of all dues.

provisional_certificate.description: Application for provisional certificate for passed-out students awaiting their final degree.
provisional_certificate.notes: Issued before the degree certificate becomes available.

library_clearance.description: Clearance form required before obtaining degree or hostel clearance.
library_clearance.notes: All borrowed books must be returned before clearance.

internship_letter.description: No Objection Certificate (NOC) for internships during the semester break.
internship_letter.notes: NOC is mandatory for internships exceeding 4 weeks.

meeting_with_dean.description: Application to schedule an official meeting with the Dean or Head of Department.
required_documents: Handwritten application stating purpose of meeting
meeting_with_dean.notes: Appointment confirmation will be sent via email.

grade_improvement.description: Application for re-evaluation or improvement of grades.
grade_improvement.notes: Re-evaluation results are final and binding.

address_proof_request.description: Request for official address proof issued by DTU (for passport, bank, etc.).
address_proof_request.notes: Issued only for active students staying in DTU hostels.

official_leave_application.description: Application for official duty leave when representing DTU in events or competitions.
required_documents: Proof of event participation (invitation, mail, etc.)
official_leave_application.notes: Leave period should not overlap with exam dates.

unknown_intent.description: The request is not recognized or not related to any DTU administrative process.
unknown_intent.notes: Forwarded to the concerned department manually.
